projects.name: Weather App
projects.description:
- Integrated with a weather API to fetch accurate, detailed and up-to-date weather information for various locations.
- Also Implemented location-based services to allow users to search and retrieve weather information for specific cities or regions.

projects.name: Zoom Clone
projects.description:
- Secure user login via Clerk, supporting social sign-up and email/password methods.
- Features for recording, reactions, screen sharing, participant management, and viewing past recorded meetings and meeting details.
- Schedule or join instant meetings via links, with real-time, secure interactions and a responsive design for all devices.

projects.name: UrTracker
projects.description:
- Allows users to track and manage their expenses and income, with data stored securely in MongoDB.
- Employs Chart.js to provide visual representations of expenses and income, enhancing user insights and financial tracking.

experiences.description:
- Designed and developed a fully functional MERN stack blog web application with a user-friendly interface, responsive design, ensuring seamless content management and user experience.
- Implemented secure back-end features including user authentication, database management, and content publishing capabilities for a dynamic blog platform.
